fields.name: General Health
fields.description: General health information and common medical questions

fields.name: Symptoms
fields.description: Information about various symptoms and their potential causes

fields.name: Medications
fields.description: Information about medications, dosages, and interactions

fields.title: What is blood pressure?
fields.content: Blood pressure is the force of your blood pushing against the walls of your arteries. Each time your heart beats, it pumps blood into the arteries. Your blood pressure is highest when your heart beats, pumping the blood. This is called systolic pressure. When your heart is at rest, between beats, your blood pressure falls. This is called diastolic pressure.

fields.title: Common cold symptoms
fields.content: Common symptoms of a cold include runny or stuffy nose, sore throat, cough, congestion, slight body aches, sneezing, and low-grade fever. Cold symptoms usually start 1-3 days after exposure to a cold virus.

fields.title: Importance of regular exercise
fields.content: Regular physical activity is one of the most important things you can do for your health. Being physically active can improve your brain health, help manage weight, reduce the risk of disease, strengthen bones and muscles, and improve your ability to do everyday activities.

fields.name: Hypertension
fields.description: High blood pressure, also called hypertension, is blood pressure that is higher than normal.

fields.name: Common Cold
fields.description: A viral infection of your nose and throat (upper respiratory tract).
prevention_tips: avoid close contact with sick people

fields.name: Headache
fields.description: Pain in your head or face that's often described as a pressure that's throbbing, constant, sharp or dull.
fields.when_to_seek_help: Seek immediate medical attention if you have a sudden, severe headache, headache with fever, stiff neck, confusion, or vision changes.

fields.name: Fever
fields.description: A temporary increase in your body temperature, often due to an illness.
fields.when_to_seek_help: Seek medical attention if fever is over 103째F, lasts more than 3 days, or accompanies severe symptoms.

fields.definition: High blood pressure; a condition in which the force of the blood against the artery walls is too high.
Describes a condition that begins suddenly and is usually severe.

fields.response_text: Hello! I'm your healthcare assistant. How can I help you today? I can provide information about symptoms, medications, general health topics, or help you understand medical terms.
follow_up_questions: Do you have any health questions?
Would you like information about a specific condition?

fields.response_text: I understand you're experiencing a headache. Headaches can have various causes including tension, dehydration, stress, or eye strain. For mild headaches, you can try resting, staying hydrated, or applying a cold/warm compress. However, if you have a sudden severe headache, headache with fever, or vision changes, please seek immediate medical attention.
follow_up_questions: How long have you had this headache?
On a scale of 1-10, how severe is the pain?

fields.response_text: This sounds like it could be a medical emergency. Please seek immediate medical attention by calling emergency services or going to the nearest emergency room. Do not delay seeking professional medical help.
